Code: average person (awareness of safe cybersecurity practices)

Describes an average person's ability to manage their personal data securely. Like what you do with your personal data.

Code: high confidence in managing personal data
Description: Being confident in collecting, storing, organizing, and maintaining data to ensure that it is accessible, reliable, and secure.
Being confident in creating strong passwords.

Code: high confidence in protecting personal information
Description: Being confident in protecting individuals and systems from online threats, (such as hacking, phishing, and malware). It involves safeguarding personal information, using secure networks, and being cautious about online interactions to prevent unauthorized access and ensure digital security.

Being confident in having a deep familiarity with various security protocols, threat mitigation strategies, encryption techniques, and the ability to identify and respond to cyber threats effectively.
Accept terms and conditions, cookies, etc. without reading them for any reasons.

Code: issues with face recognition (easy to copy)
Description: Having devices comprmised because facial recongations are easy to copy.
Refers to the challenges that users face when using facial recognition. Participants noted that when part of their faces is covered, they were prevented from logging into their devices.

Refers to the challenges that users face when using fingerprints. Participants noted that they had problems with their own finger which obstructed the scanner and prevented them from logging into their device (e.g. scars on fingers)
Refers to any challenges that users face with password manager applications.
User finds using passwords difficult because it is hard to remember.
Refers to any challenges that users face with voice recognition systems. (e.g. having similar voices)
The practice of consciously installing the newest updates to the devices that you are using.
Being unaware of how to identify and respond to attacks on your system due to lack of cybersecurity knowledge.

Code: lack of discernment what to share online
Description: Lack of ability to judge what to share online.
